Verses: 1 karththarudaiya Aalayaththirku Povom Vaarungal Endru Enakku Avargal Sonnapodhu Magizhchchiyaayirundhen.
2 erusaleme, Un Vaasalgalil Engal Kaalgal Nirkalaayitru.
4 ange Isravelukku Saatchiyaaga Karththarudaiya Janangalaagiya Koththirangal Karththarin Naamaththai Sthoththirippadharku Pogum.
5 ange Thaaveedhin Vamsaththaarudaiya Singaasanangalaagiya Niyaayaasanangal Vaikkappattirukkiradhu.
6 erusalemin Samaadhaanaththukkaaga Vendikkollungal; Unnai Nesikkiravargal Sugiththiruppaargalaaga.
7 un Alangaththirkulle Samaadhaanamum, Un Aramanaigalukkulle Sugamum Iruppadhaaga.
8 en Sagodharar Nimiththamum En Sinegidhar Nimiththamum, Unnil Samaadhaanam Iruppadhaaga Enben
9 engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Aalayaththinimiththam Unakku Nanmaiyundaagath Theduven.
